blue.description: A boolean indicating whether the blue output is active (changed last). This is always the inverse of green.

blue_timestamp.description: An UTC RFC333 timestamp denoting the last time the blue value was updated.

green.description: A boolean indicating whether the green output is active (changed last). This is always the inverse of blue.

green_timestamp.description: An UTC RFC333 timestamp denoting the last time the green value was updated.

trigger.description: An arbitrary string value that, when changed, toggles the output.
